S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-2243 Modifying the return type for methods like - supportsANSI92EntryLevelSQL() - supportsExpressionsInOrderBy() in EmbedDatabaseMetaData.java to return TRUE as Derby does support these features Thus now the behavior is consistent across drivers. Contributed by Saurabh Vyas Saurabh.Vyas@Sun.COM
